attributes.action: phase in mandatory HOME CONDITION REPORTS, save the consumer time and money in buying a home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this can benefit the purchaser greatly, as they would normally have to pay for surveys to assess the condition sometimes on more than one property, this would be better for first timers who need every saving they can get! there are benefits for everyone, it also gives sellers a chance to put right any problem & get the best price for their home and save on costs buying their new home!
